copied.title: Copied!
copied.description: The content has been copied to the clipboard.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred. Please try again.

header.title: Welcome, Professor!
header.description: Perfect Professor is your AI assistant to simplify preparing your English classes.

examSuggestion.title: Exam Suggestion
examSuggestion.description: Generate exam questions based on specific topics, difficulties, and curricula.

correctionAssistance.title: Correction Assistance
correctionAssistance.description: Get automated assistance to correct homework and identify common errors.

homeworkCreation.title: Homework Creation
homeworkCreation.description: Create customized exercises tailored to different skill levels and topics.

lessonPlanning.title: Lesson Planning
lessonPlanning.description: Plan complete lessons with clear objectives, activities, and assessments.

header.title: Exam Suggestion
header.description: Generate complete, customized exams in seconds.

form.title: Exam Parameters
form.description: Fill in the details to generate suggestions.

results.title: Exam Suggestions
results.description: Here are the AI-generated suggestions. Choose one.
results.placeholder2: Fill out the form and click "Generate".

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your exam suggestions have been generated.

toast.pdfError: Could not find exam content to generate the PDF.

downloadSuccess.title: Download Successful
downloadSuccess.description: The exam PDF has been downloaded.

header.title: Correction Assistance
header.description: Submit a student's work to get AI-assisted correction.

form.title: Submit Assignment
form.description: Provide the details of the assignment to be corrected.

studentAssignment.label: Student Assignment (Text)
studentAssignment.placeholder: Paste the student's assignment text here...

results.title: Correction Results
results.placeholder: The correction results will appear here.

success.title: Correction Complete!
success.description: The correction has been successfully generated.

header.title: Homework Creation
header.description: Generate tailored homework exercises for your students.

form.title: Homework Parameters
form.description: Fill in the details to generate exercises.

results.title: Generated Exercises
results.description: Here are the AI-generated homework exercises.
results.placeholder: The generated exercises will appear here.

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your homework exercises have been generated.

toast.pdfError: Could not find homework content to generate the PDF.

downloadSuccess.title: Download Successful
downloadSuccess.description: The homework PDF has been downloaded.

header.title: Lesson Planning
header.description: Create detailed lesson plans with AI assistance.

form.title: Lesson Parameters
form.description: Fill in the details to generate the lesson plan.

results.title: Generated Lesson Plan
results.description: Here is the detailed AI-generated lesson plan.
results.placeholder: The generated lesson plan will appear here.

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your lesson plan has been generated.

toast.pdfError: Could not find lesson plan content to generate the PDF.

downloadSuccess.title: Download Successful
downloadSuccess.description: The lesson plan PDF has been downloaded.
